display_long_description:
"Emotions of Love" is a unique narrative virtual reality (VR) experience that immerses users in a poignant and relatable love story. The narrative unfolds as a journey through the lives of two young individuals who meet, fall in love, and navigate the complexities of a romantic relationship. The VR experience seamlessly blends storytelling with interactive elements, providing users with a unique and emotionally charged journey. It is an emotional rollercoaster, with each room representing a different facet of the characters' emotional spectrum. The experience delves into the nuances of love, exploring not only the passionate moments but also the challenges and heartbreaks that come with relationships. 

"Emotions of Love" is available in English, Estonian, Danish, Czech and in Maltese languages.

"Emotions of Love" was created in cooperation with the "Kissing Tartu" project, which is part of the official programme of the European Capital of Culture Tartu 2024. More info: https://tartu2024.ee/en/kissingtartu/
